field.name: summary
field.value: Class proxy with target doesn't forward interface methods not implemented by proxied class

field.name: description
field.value:
Here's the scenario: we create a proxy for class Foo, that doesn't implement IBar, we pass IBar as one of additional interfaces to proxy, so that the proxy type does implement it and we use FooBar (which itself does implement IBar) as target. When calling methods from IBar on the proxy the calls should be forwarded to the target (since it does implement the interface.
Currently they are not unless Foo itself implements IBar.
